comment: A weak version of ~ rexv not using ~ ax-ext (nor ~ df-cleq , ~ df-clel , ~ df-v ), and only core FOL axioms. See also ~ bj-ralvw . (Contributed by BJ, 16-Jun-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
